dcterms:creator: P. Ekman
W. V. Friesen
dcterms:description: The Facial Action Coding System (FACS) is a comprehensive framework for categorizing the physical expression of emotions through facial movements.
dcterms:title: FACS (Facial Action Coding System)

dcterms:creator: P. Ekman
dcterms:description: The dataset on basic emotions categorizes emotions into fundamental types that are universally recognized.
dcterms:title: Basic emotions

dcterms:creator: P. Fitzgerald
I. Leudar
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on non-verbal cues used in psychology and counseling, particularly in the context of active listening.
dcterms:title: Non-verbal cues from psychology and counseling

dcterms:creator: D. A. Sauter
F. Eisner
P. Ekman
S. K. Scott
dcterms:description: This dataset examines the cross-cultural recognition of basic emotions through nonverbal emotional vocalizations.
dcterms:title: Cross-cultural recognition of basic emotions through nonverbal emotional vocalizations
